alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 10:39AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 1130 AM MST... At 1039 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blackwater, or 8 miles northwest of Coolidge. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Coolidge and Blackwater. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 184 and 188. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 132 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
